en.WELCOME_MESSAGE: Welcome to the Monday Mail. If you need help, just ask!
en.HELP_MESSAGE: You can ask me what's new. While a message is playing, you can also ask to skip the message, to go back, or to repeat the message, just like an answer phone! What can I help you with?
en.HELP_REPROMPT: What can I help you with?

de.TODO: Do we have any Germans in Kilburn?
